price: هغه د ختيځ او لوېديځ څښتن دى، له هغه پرته بل معبود نشته نو همغه خپل وكيل ونيسه.
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakīlan
